posts.post_content: If anybody out there has any ballpark postcards you're willing to sell or trade, especially from before 1920 or so, let me know. You can PM or email me at [url]dkathman@uchicago.edu[/url].

[quote name="trdcrdkid" post=1644706]If anybody out there has any ballpark postcards you're willing to sell or trade, especially from before 1920 or so, let me know. You can PM or email me at [url]dkathman@uchicago.edu[/url].[/QUOTE]

 
I have 10 at hand.....about half of them postmarked....in decent to nice condition...
